it.ma.polimi.briscola.model.deck

Interface Deck<CARD extends Card>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CardListWrapper<CARD>, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDeck, NeapolitanDeck

    public interface Deck<CARD extends Card>
extends CardListWrapper<CARD>
    Interface representing a deck. Extends CardListWrapper interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CARD drawCardFromBottom()
      Draw card from the deck's bottom, as a side effect the card is removed from the deck.
      CARD drawCardFromTop()
      Draw card from top of the deck, as a side effect the card is removed from the deck
      void putCardToBottom(CARD card)
      Put a card to the deck's bottom.
      Deck shuffleDeck(Shuffler shuffler)
      Shuffle deck.

      • Methods inherited from interface it.ma.polimi.briscola.model.deck.CardListWrapper

        appendAll, appendCard, clearCardList, containsCard, equalTo, getCard, getCardList, getMaxNumCardsAllowedInList, isEmpty, removeCard, setCardList, size

    • Method Detail

      • shuffleDeck

        Deck shuffleDeck(Shuffler shuffler)
        Shuffle deck.
        Parameters:
        shuffler - An object implementing the Shuffler interface, so as that any shuffling algorithm can be passed
        Returns:
        The shuffled deck

      • drawCardFromTop

        CARD drawCardFromTop()
        Draw card from top of the deck, as a side effect the card is removed from the deck
        Returns:
        The top most card of the deck
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the deck is empty

      • putCardToBottom

        void putCardToBottom(CARD card)
        Put a card to the deck's bottom.
        Parameters:
        card - The card that should be put at the end of the deck

      • drawCardFromBottom

        CARD drawCardFromBottom()
        Draw card from the deck's bottom, as a side effect the card is removed from the deck.
        Returns:
        The card at the deck's bottom
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the deck is empty
